metadata.description:
aurel is an artist from biel - switzerland. his early musical experiences are characterized by playing percussion at school, and after that he joined a free jazz band, where he played the drums. afer a concert from the "art of noise" he explored electronic music.
this ep is compiled from studio works between 2000 and 2002. aurels tracks unfold themselves in a very long and slowly way. he searches for deepness and plug the music into states of infinity. you can read in the structure of his tracks the days and nights of live-experience of improvised music.
metadata.title: aurel - thousand lifes ep [63_044]
metadata.subject: Electronic;Indie-tronica;scape
